dialog.text: The background is cloud, and the foreground is rock from the bottom to the about half way up on the left, and two third way on the right.
Is there anything in front of the rocks?
There is a small sea area about one fourth way up from the bottom on the left half, and in the middle 50% there is a chunk of mountain.
Is the mountain on the left side or does it span the entire 50% area
The mountain is on both side however as it spans to the right it gets narrower.
Are there any trees or plants?
There are no trees or plants, there are a few dots of stones along the left margin.
How far up do the stones go?
go all the way up to the top of the rocks all the right side.
The stones are on the right side or the left side or both?
Only lightly scattered on the left side.
The mountain on the left side should be taller than the right side. There is also a few peaks on the right.
Is there any more water in the picture?
no but should make the sea portion larger and more distinct
Make the rock on the left side lower and its good
